item.title: Microservices
item.author: Sharad
item.description: Introducton Microservices - also known as the microservice architecture - is an architectural style that structures an application as a collection of services that are Highly maintainable and testable Loosely coupled Independently deployable Organized around business capabilities Owned by a small team The microservice architecture enables the rapid, frequent and reliable delivery of large, complex applications. It also enables an organization to evolve its technology stack. Install Docker Install Docker: Windows Use the following URL and download the installation file: https://hub.
